newsitem.title: USA: Universal Health says buys interest in LLC.
newsitem.headline: Universal Health says buys interest in LLC.

text.p: Universal Health Realty Income Trust said Tuesday it has paid $1.9 million for a 75 percent equity interest in a limited liability company that bought the Thunderbird Paseo Medical Plaza.
The LLC bought the plaza for $8.2 million, including $5.9 million of long-term, non-recourse debt.
Universal Health was not immediately able to provide the name of the LLC.
Universal Health said Thunderbird Paseo Medical Plaza is a 58,000-square-foot medical office building in Glendale, Arizona and is leased to local and regional tenants.
Universal Health Realty Income Trust, a real estate investment trust, invests in healthcare and human service related facilities.
